title: Upstart
desc: For SaaS, startups, product sites, and landing pagesâ eye-catching, i18n, smooth animations.
article:
Elevate your SaaS or startup with Upstart, the ultimate Astro Js theme for modern businesses. With unparalleled customization options, full multilingual (i18n) support, and cutting-edge SEO features, Upstart empowers you to create a visually stunning and high-converting website.

Engage your audience in a captivating way with interactive, physics-based animations. It includes essential you need to showcase your product or services and grow your audience effortlessly.

Why Choose This Theme?

Upstarts stands out with its exceptional features, animations, trendy designs, and attention to detail. It is designed for developers and businesses alike:

  • Privacy First: No tracking or cookies by default, GDPR-compliant analytics, and self-hosted Google Fonts for better privacy.
  • Modern and Customizable Design: Sleek layouts with pre-built pages for Homepage, About, Services, Career, Blog.
  • Rich Customization: Includes sticky headers, mega menus, animated buttons, and powerful shortcodes for interactive elements like tabs, accordions, videos, galleries, and testimonials.
  • Interactive Animations: Physics-based animations for a captivating user experience.
  • Developer-Friendly Features: Full multilingual support, flexible configurations, advanced forms (Formsubmit, Netlify, Formspree), and customizable font options.
  • Outstanding Performance: Achieve top-tier performance with 100/100 Lighthouse SEO scores and optimized usability.
  • Content-Ready: Preloaded with royalty-free photos, illustrations, icons, and sample content, making it easy to launch without starting from scratch.
